        public HLPlayer(java.lang.String name,
                int sidesOne,
                int sidesTwo,
                int initialPoints)
        This constructor creates the player with the required player information
        Parameters:
        name - A String of the name of the player
        sidesOne - An Integer of the number of sides on die one
        sidesTwo - An Integer of the number of sides on die two
        initialPoints - An Integer of the amount of initial points

        This method lets the user make a call

        public void makeCall(HLPlayer.Call userCall)
        This method lets the user make a call
        Parameters:
        userCall - A Call type for the call that the user made. Call can be Call.HIGH or Call.LOW.
